### hi there 👋

- 🎓 computer science student at the federal university of paraná (UFPR)_
- 🤖 machine learning intern and undergraduate machine learning researcher_
- 🤩 my main interests are ml/ai, algorithms, databases, security and operating systems_
- 👨‍💻 i like working with c/c++ and python (currently studying rust)_
- 🐧 i use arch btw_
- 🌐 [davidlpgomes.com](https://davidlpgomes.com)
